title: Payment Agent: Withdraw (response)
description: The result of payment agent withdrawal request made.

paymentagent_withdraw.title: paymentagent_withdraw
paymentagent_withdraw.description: If set to `1`, withdrawal success. If set to `2`, dry-run success.

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
